title: Just switched servers and now I am in a pickle?
body: Since Riot wants to kill EUNE, I just bailed and got onto EUW instead. However, a lot of features on that server is disabled for me (such as purchasing RP) because apparently my email became un-verified because of the transfer or something...? I can't even contact support because of that. Halp.

replies.body: Are you still experiencing issues with this? Sometimes this occurs if the transfer is hanging up on a few things, but it should have been resolved by now.
